Games

Small games projects that I've worked on along the way, usually game jam related.

Super cyber world under attack by a massive virus that wants to take over all bases!

A 2D Platformer game, made for Godot Wild Jam #53. The cyberworld has been breached, the defenses are up and the virus is coming
Engine Used.: Godot
Version.: v3.5.stable.official

Immortal Plight

A 2D Twin Sticker Shooter, made for Godot Wild Jam #53. Control a sold soul in hell, who must put on a show and clear wave after wave of hellish creatures with a specific curse.
Engine Used.: Godot
Version.: v3.5.stable.official
